com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.services

Class CardBeanImageServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.services.CardBeanImageServices

  • public class CardBeanImageServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides service methods for complex tasks related to image files of CardBean objects.
    Author:
    Sebastian Dine

      • CardBeanImageServices

    • Method Detail

      • uploadImageFile

        public static void uploadImageFile(CardBean cardBean,
                                   java.io.File imageFile,
                                   ImageEnum imgType)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method copies the given File object into the image directory of the application and renames it, according to the given CardBean object. Furthermore it maintains the File object in the given CardBean.
        Parameters:
        cardBean - CardBean object which is assigned to the given image file. This object will be used to generate the name of the copied filed. Furthermore the new File object will be stored in this object.
        imageFile - File object of an image, which will be copied to the image directory of the application.
        imgType - type of the image file. This will be used to determine, where to store the absolute path of the new file within the given CardBean object. ImageEnum.IMG_FRONT stores the image as front image of the CardBean object, ImageEnum.IMG_BACK as a back image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If interaction with the file system is not possible, e.g. through restricted permissions, an IOException will be thrown.

      • deleteImageFiles

        public static void deleteImageFiles(CardBean cardBean)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This method deletes the corresponding image files to the given CardBean object from the file system. Afterwards,i t sets the corresponding attributes of the CardBean object to null.
        Parameters:
        cardBean - CardBean object for which the corresponding image files should be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If interaction with the file system is not possible, e.g. through restricted permissions, an IOException will be thrown.

      • scaleImageByPreferredHeight

        public static java.awt.Image scaleImageByPreferredHeight(java.awt.Image image,
                                                         int height)
        This method scales a given Image object according a given height.
        Parameters:
        image - Image which should be scaled.
        height - Height to which the image should be scaled.
        Returns:
        scaled Image.

      • scaleImageByPreferredWidth

        public static java.awt.Image scaleImageByPreferredWidth(java.awt.Image image,
                                                        int width)
        This method scales a given Image object according a given width.
        Parameters:
        image - Image which should be scaled.
        width - Width to which the image should be scaled.
        Returns:
        scaled Image.
